page.title: 15HOUSING
page.content: Camber was evacuated during the l939/45 war and many of the dwellings were demolished at that time. In the last few years many of the older bungalows have been improved and now there is a considerable programme of building taking place. One site has five bungalows in the course of building at prices between Â£35,950 and Â£40,000. Two new estates are being built with prices from Â£23,950 upwards. These consist of terraced and semi-detached houses, with small gardens, and either build-in garages or garages nearby. There is a small council house estate in Pelwood Road and Saunders Way and Fleetway Court are blocks of flats. The most desirable houses in Camber are on The Suttons an unadopted road, these houses are larger and overlook the sea and beach.
